post.description: Create bot (Permission: BOTS_WRITE, Security: SIGNED)

parameters.name: trailing_enabled
parameters.description: Enable trailing take profit. Binance only.

parameters.name: safety_order_step_percentage
parameters.description: Price deviation to open safety trades(percentage)

parameters.name: take_profit_type
parameters.description: Percentage: base – from base trade, total – from total volume

parameters.name: strategy_list
parameters.description:
For manual signals: [{"strategy":"manual"}] or []
For non-stop(1 pair only): [{"strategy":"nonstop"}]
QFL: {"options"=>{"type"=>"original"}, "strategy"=>"qfl"}]
TradingView: [{"options"=>{"time"=>"5m", "type"=>"buy_or_strong_buy"}, "strategy"=>"trading_view"}

201.description: Create bot (Permission: BOTS_WRITE, Security: SIGNED)

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Account to show bots on. Return all if not specified. Gather this from GET /ver1/accounts

get.description: Get bot stats (Permission: BOTS_READ, Security: SIGNED)

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Account to show on. Null - show for all. Gather this from GET /ver1/accounts

parameters.name: bot_id
parameters.description: Bots to show on. Null - show for all

200.description: Get bot stats (Permission: BOTS_READ, Security: SIGNED)

parameters.name: trailing_enabled
parameters.description: Enable trailing take profit. Binance only.

parameters.name: safety_order_step_percentage
parameters.description: Price deviation to open safety trades(percentage)

parameters.name: take_profit_type
parameters.description: Percentage: base – from base trade, total – from total volume

parameters.name: strategy_list
parameters.description:
For manual signals: [{"strategy":"nonstop"}] or []
For non-stop(1 pair only): [{"strategy":"nonstop"}]
QFL: {"options"=>{"type"=>"original"}, "strategy"=>"qfl"}]
TradingView: [{"options"=>{"time"=>"5m", "type"=>"buy_or_strong_buy"}, "strategy"=>"trading_view"}

parameters.name: pair
parameters.description: Can be omited for simple bot

parameters.name: skip_signal_checks
parameters.description: If false or not specified then all paramaters like signals or volume filters will be checked. If true - those checks will be skipped

parameters.name: skip_open_deals_checks
parameters.description: If true then you will be allowed to open more then one deal per pair in composite bot

parameters.name: bot_id
parameters.description: Bot show deals on. Return all if not specified

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: active - active deals, finished - finished deals, completed - successfully completed, cancelled - cancelled deals, failed - failed deals, any other value or null (default) - all deals

post.description: Create SmartSale (Permission: SMART_TRADE_WRITE, Security: SIGNED)

parameters.name: take_profit_type
parameters.description: Required if take_profit_enabled. classic - common take profit, step_sell - step sell take profit

parameters.name: take_profit_percentage_condition
parameters.description: Required if take_profit_type = classic AND trailing_buy_enabled. Must be positive

parameters.name: take_profit_step_orders
parameters.description: Required if take_profit_type = step_sell. 4 steps max. Format: [{percent: 50, price: 100(or price_percentage = 20), price_method: bid,ask,last}, ...]

parameters.name: take_profit_step_orders[price_percentage]
parameters.description: Required if take_profit_step_orders AND trailing_buy_enabled. Must be positive

parameters.name: stop_loss_percentage_condition
parameters.description: Required if stop_loss_enabled AND trailing_buy_enabled. Must be negative

201.description: Create SmartSale (Permission: SMART_TRADE_WRITE, Security: SIGNED)

parameters.name: take_profit_percentage_condition
parameters.description: Required if take_profit_type = classic AND trailing_buy_enabled. Must be negative

parameters.name: take_profit_step_orders
parameters.description: Required if take_profit_type = step_sell. 4 steps max. Format: [{percent: 50, price: 100(or price_percentage = 20), price_method: bid,ask,last}, ...]

parameters.name: take_profit_step_orders[price_percentage]
parameters.description: Required if take_profit_step_orders AND trailing_buy_enabled. Must be negative

parameters.name: stop_loss_percentage_condition
parameters.description: Required if stop_loss_enabled AND trailing_buy_enabled. Must Be positive

parameters.description: Required if take_profit_type = classic AND trailing_buy_enabled. Must be positive

parameters.name: take_profit_step_orders
parameters.description: Required if take_profit_type = step_sell. 4 steps max. Format: [{percent: 50, price: 100(or price_percentage = 20), price_method: bid,ask,last}, ...]

parameters.name: take_profit_step_orders[price_percentage]

get.description: Get SmartTrade history (Permission: SMART_TRADE_READ, Security: SIGNED)

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Account to show smart_trades on. Pass null (default) - show all

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: active - show only active trades, finished - history of closed trades, cancelled - cancelled trades, failed - failed trades, any other value or null (default) - all trades

200.description: Get SmartTrade history (Permission: SMART_TRADE_READ, Security: SIGNED)

post.description: Step panic sell (Permission: SMART_TRADE_WRITE, Security: SIGNED)

201.description: Step panic sell (Permission: SMART_TRADE_WRITE, Security: SIGNED)

parameters.name: take_profit_type
parameters.description: Required if take_profit_enabled. classic - common take profit, step_sell - step sell take profit

parameters.name: take_profit_percentage_condition
parameters.description: Required if take_profit_type = classic AND trailing_buy_enabled

parameters.name: take_profit_step_orders
parameters.description:
Available if take_profit_type = step_sell. If null - steps won't be changed.
                                                    In order to apply changes - send a new set of steps, which contains new and previous steps that were not edited.
                                                    Position must be unique(for new and previous steps in SmartTrade scope) and greater then 0

status.description: Values: created, base_order_placed, bought, cancelled, completed, failed, panic_sell_pending, panic_sell_order_placed, panic_sold, cancel_pending, stop_loss_pending, stop_loss_finished, stop_loss_order_placed, switched, switched_take_profit, ttp_activated, ttp_order_placed, liquidated

trailing_max_price.description: Highest price met in case of long deal, lowest price otherwise

status.description: Values: buy_order_placed, bought, stop_loss_order_placed, take_profit_order_placed, stop_loss_finished, take_profit_finished, cancelled, failed, panic_sell_order_placed, panic_sell_finished, trailing_take_profit_activated, conditional_order_waiting_price, trailing_buy_activated, simple_trade_finished

type.description: Values: SmartTrade::Classic, SmartTrade::ConditionalBuy, SmartTrade::SmartSale, SmartTrade::SellBuyBack, SmartTrade::ConditionalSell, SmartTrade::SimpleBuy, SmartTrade::ConditionalSimpleBuy, SmartTrade::ConditionalSimpleSell, SmartTrade::SimpleSell

SmartTradeStep::TrailingStopLossStep, SmartTradeStep::StopLossStep, SmartTradeStep::TrailingStopLossBuyStep, SmartTradeStep::StopLossBuyStep, SmartTradeStep::TakeProfitStep, SmartTradeStep::TrailingTakeProfitStep, SmartTradeStep::TakeProfitBuyStep, SmartTradeStep::TrailingTakeProfitBuyStep

status.description: Values: idle, enqueued, need_check, processed, skipped, failed, cancelled, panic_sold
